author: Liz Hoffman
title: Against #MeToo Backdrop, Top Female Dealmakers Sound Off
text: Stephanie Cohen is used to the reaction. The petite 41-year-old has spent the past two decades at running big deals for industrial companies and private-equity firms. “I walk into a boardroom and I’m not who they expect to see,” she said. But that can be an advantage, she said.
